issues.description: Inconsistent capitalization: using uppercase for library names and signal names (IEEE, STD_LOGIC_1164, CLK) instead of lowercase
suggestions: Use lowercase for library names: 'library ieee;'
Use lowercase for use clause: 'use ieee.std_logic_1164.all;'
Use consistent lowercase for signal names: 'clk' instead of 'CLK'
issues.reasoning: Modern VHDL style conventions prefer consistent lowercase for library names, package names, and signal identifiers for better readability and consistency.

issues.description: Old-style clock edge detection using 'event attribute instead of falling_edge function
suggestions: Use falling_edge(clk) instead of (CLK'event and CLK='0')
Modern VHDL functions are more readable and less error-prone
issues.reasoning: Using falling_edge(clk) is the modern, recommended approach for detecting falling clock edges. Old-style 'event checks are more verbose and prone to errors.

issues.description: Missing spaces in process sensitivity list and around assignment operators
suggestions: Add spaces in sensitivity list: 'process(x0, x1, S0, S1, S2, S3)'
Add spaces around assignment operators: 'D(0) <= S0' instead of 'D(0)<=S0'
Add spaces around assignment operators: 'y1 <= S1' instead of 'y1<=S1'
issues.reasoning: Spaces around operators and between items in lists improve code readability and follow VHDL style guidelines.
